issue.title: custom main problems with time and loading plugins

content.raw:
Are there any news about the sensors not loaded using custom main ? 

I tried this http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/9491/how-to-bring-up-sensors-in-a-stand-alone-gazebo/ but I get a crash while trying to load a camera sensor via spawn_model : 


```

#0  0x00007fffc6e44e29 in glGenBuffersARB () from /usr/lib/nvidia-352-updates/libGL.so.1
#1  0x00007fff94f4c510 in Ogre::GLHardwareVertexBuffer::GLHardwareVertexBuffer(Ogre::HardwareBufferManagerBase*, unsigned long, unsigned long, Ogre::HardwareBuffer::Usage, bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.8.0/RenderSystem_GL.so
#2  0x00007fff94f4752f in Ogre::GLHardwareBufferManagerBase::createVertexBuffer(unsigned long, unsigned long, Ogre::HardwareBuffer::Usage, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.8.0/RenderSystem_GL.so
#3  0x00007fff94f56ce5 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.8.0/RenderSystem_GL.so
#4  0x00007fffd1e006d5 in SkyX::MeshManager::_createGeometry() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#5  0x00007fffd1e00fe1 in SkyX::MeshManager::create() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#6  0x00007fffd1e02ff7 in SkyX::SkyX::create() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#7  0x00007fffd1d955d6 in gazebo::rendering::Scene::SetSky() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#8  0x00007fffd1da1b10 in gazebo::rendering::Scene::Init() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#9  0x00007fffd1d85308 in gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine::CreateScene(std::string const&, bool, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#10 0x00007fffd1d8b8c3 in gazebo::rendering::create_scene(std::string const&, bool, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#11 0x00007fffd823b4ea in gazebo::sensors::CameraSensor::Init() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_sensors.so.7
#12 0x00007fffd8274200 in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::Update(bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_sensors.so.7

```
content.html:
Are there any news about the sensors not loaded using custom main ?

I tried this http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/9491/how-to-bring-up-sensors-in-a-stand-alone-gazebo/ but I get a crash while trying to load a camera sensor via spawn_model : 

#0  0x00007fffc6e44e29 in glGenBuffersARB () from /usr/lib/nvidia-352-updates/libGL.so.1
#1  0x00007fff94f4c510 in Ogre::GLHardwareVertexBuffer::GLHardwareVertexBuffer(Ogre::HardwareBufferManagerBase*, unsigned long, unsigned long, Ogre::HardwareBuffer::Usage, bool) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.8.0/RenderSystem_GL.so
#2  0x00007fff94f4752f in Ogre::GLHardwareBufferManagerBase::createVertexBuffer(unsigned long, unsigned long, Ogre::HardwareBuffer::Usage, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.8.0/RenderSystem_GL.so
#3  0x00007fff94f56ce5 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.8.0/RenderSystem_GL.so
#4  0x00007fffd1e006d5 in SkyX::MeshManager::_createGeometry() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#5  0x00007fffd1e00fe1 in SkyX::MeshManager::create() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#6  0x00007fffd1e02ff7 in SkyX::SkyX::create() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#7  0x00007fffd1d955d6 in gazebo::rendering::Scene::SetSky() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#8  0x00007fffd1da1b10 in gazebo::rendering::Scene::Init() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#9  0x00007fffd1d85308 in gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine::CreateScene(std::string const&, bool, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#10 0x00007fffd1d8b8c3 in gazebo::rendering::create_scene(std::string const&, bool, bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_rendering.so.7
#11 0x00007fffd823b4ea in gazebo::sensors::CameraSensor::Init() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_sensors.so.7
#12 0x00007fffd8274200 in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::Update(bool) () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgazebo_sensors.so.7
